message: Let's end this quickly. 10% inflation is no joke!
The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese. Think about it.
The clock is ticking, Bob.  Let's be reasonable.
Time may be money Alice, but it's running out faster for you.  Let's be practical.
Last chance, Bob.  The next offer I make will be much worse... for me.
Tick-tock Alice. It's my way or the highway paved with deflated dollars.
